words.example: The approaching examination created a tense atmosphere on the campus
words.tips: 【词根】atmo-意为“气体”；【联想】想象一个星球的气氛；【图像】画出一个大气层的层次结构。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“atmosphere”在“大气层；氛围”语境中的常见用法。

words.example: All the water in the earth's surface is included in the hydrosphere
words.tips: 【词根】hydro-意为“水”；【图像】想象地球周围的水圈；【联想】hydrosphere像“水的领域”。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“hydrosphere”在“水圈；大气中的水汽”语境中的常见用法。

words.example: The lithosphere and the hydrosphere together form the earth's surface
words.tips: 【词根】litho-意为“石头”；【联想】想象地球的外壳是由岩石组成的；【图像】把“lithosphere”看作地球的“石头外衣”。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“lithosphere”在“岩石圈”语境中的常见用法。

words.tips: 【词根】"oxy"表示“氧”，联想化学中的氧气；【图像】想象蓝天中的氧气分子；【谐音】“氧”与“养”谐音，氧气让生命得以“养”活。
words.example: Understanding the concept of oxygen is essential for addressing challenges in environmental protection.
words.example_translation: Understanding the concept of oxygen is 必要的 for addressing 挑战 in 环境保护.

words.tips: 【词根】"ox"意为氧；【后缀】"-ide"表示化合物；【联想】想象氧与其他元素结合形成氧化物。
words.example: Understanding the concept of oxide is essential for addressing challenges in renewable energy.
words.example_translation: Understanding the concept of oxide is 必要的 for addressing 挑战 in 可再生能源.

words.tips: 【联想】碳（carbon）像黑色的煤；【谐音】“二氧化碳”听起来像“二阳化炭”；【图像】想象气泡中冒出的二氧化碳。
words.example: The carbon dioxide has become increasingly important in discussions about environmental protection.
words.example_translation: The carbon dioxide has become increasingly 重要的 in discussions about 环境保护.

words.tips: 【词根】hydro-表示“水”，与氢气有关；【联想】氢气是水的成分之一；【谐音】“氢”与“轻”相似，氢气比空气轻。
words.example: The government's new hydrogen policy aims to improve cultural diversity.
words.example_translation: The 政府's new hydrogen 政策 aims to improve 文化多样性.

words.tips: 【联想】想象一个苹果的核心；【词根】core源自拉丁文，意为“心”；【图像】想象一个地球模型，地核在中心。
words.example: Understanding the concept of core is essential for addressing challenges in cultural diversity.
words.example_translation: Understanding the concept of core is 必要的 for addressing 挑战 in 文化多样性.

words.example: The crust on the snow was thick enough for us to walk on it
words.tips: 【联想】想象面包的外壳；【谐音】“克斯特”像“壳”的发音；【词根】与“破裂”相关，地壳是地球的外层。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“crust”在“地壳；外壳”语境中的常见用法。

words.example: Parents often use mantles for their babies to keep warm
words.tips: 【联想】想象“斗篷”覆盖在身体上；【词根】mantle与“覆盖”相关；【图像】想象地球的“地幔”像一层斗篷。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“mantle”在“地幔；斗篷；披风；覆盖”语境中的常见用法。

words.tips: 【词根】long-表示“长”，经度是地球的“长线”；【图像】想象地球上的长线，帮助记忆经度；【谐音】“龙”+“几度”，记住经度的“度”数。
words.example: Recent studies have shown that longitude plays a crucial role in education systems.
words.example_translation: Recent 研究 have shown that longitude plays a 关键的 role in 教育体系.

words.tips: 【词根】lat表示“宽”或“扩展”；【联想】想象地球的纬线像宽宽的带子；【图像】想象地图上横向的线条。
words.example: Understanding the concept of latitude is essential for addressing challenges in social media impact.
words.example_translation: Understanding the concept of latitude is 必要的 for addressing 挑战 in 社交媒体影响.

words.example: |horizontal adj. 水平的。broaden sb.'s horizons 开阔眼界
words.tips: 【谐音】“海瑞赞”像海面与天相接；【图像】想象地平线是一条分割天空与大地的线；【联想】视野宽广，像地平线无尽延展。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“horizon”在“地平线；[~s]眼界；见识”语境中的常见用法。

words.tips: 【词根】alt-表示“高”；【联想】想象山顶的高度；【图像】画出高山和云层。
words.example: Recent studies have shown that altitude plays a crucial role in artificial intelligence.
words.example_translation: Recent 研究 have shown that altitude plays a 关键的 role in 人工智能.

words.example: There was a great flood disaster in East China|a disaster film/movie 灾难片
words.tips: 【词根】dis-表示“分开，散开”；【后缀】-aster表示“星”，联想到星星坠落造成的灾难；【谐音】“地灾”与disaster发音相似，容易记忆。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“disaster”在“灾难”语境中的常见用法。

words.example: A mishap prevented him from attending the routine company meeting
words.tips: 【谐音】“米”加“惨”；想象米饭因为意外而变得惨不忍睹。;【联想】“mishap”包含“hap”，联想到“happen”，意外发生。;【词根】“mis-”表示错误，想象错误导致的小灾难。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“mishap”在“小灾难”语境中的常见用法。

words.example: If the forecast had been wrong, the consequences could have been catastrophic
words.tips: 【词根】catastro-意为“灾难”；【联想】联想到“灾难”时的恐怖场景；【图像】想象一场大灾难的场面。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“catastrophic”在“灾难性的”语境中的常见用法。

words.example: A hurricane would be a calamity for this low-lying coastal region|cause a calamity 酿成灾祸
words.tips: 【谐音】“卡拉米提”听起来像“卡拉灾”；【联想】联想到“灾难”的情景；【词根】calam-表示“灾难”，易于记忆。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“calamity”在“灾难；不幸的事”语境中的常见用法。

words.example: If you are work hard without reset, you will endanger your health|endangered adj. 濒临灭绝
words.tips: 【词根】“danger”意为“危险”，前面加“en”表示“使之处于危险中”；【联想】想象一个“危险的地方”，让人感到被危及；【图像】想象一个动物在悬崖边缘，随时可能掉落，表示“遭受危险”。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“endanger”在“使遭受危险；危及”语境中的常见用法。

words.example: If you are rude to the boss, your chances of success may be jeopardised|jeopardise sb.'s life 危及某人生命
words.tips: 【谐音】“jeopardise”像“接怕死”；想象接触危险。；【词根】“jeopard”表示危险；联想到“危险”这个概念。；【联想】把“jeopardise”想象成“危机”的一种状态。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“jeopardise/jeopardize”在“危害；危及”语境中的常见用法。

words.example: Jealousy is an extremely destructive emotion
words.tips: 【词根】“struct”表示“构建”，破坏即是“构建”的反义词；【前缀】“de-”表示“去掉”，去掉构建就是破坏；【联想】想象一座建筑被摧毁，产生破坏的感觉。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“destructive”在“破坏性的；有害的”语境中的常见用法。

words.tips: 【谐音】“厄尔尼诺”听起来像“我能弄”；【联想】想象天气变热，像“热”的“你”；【图像】记住“El”像“阳光”，代表温暖的气候。
words.example: Recent studies have shown that El Nino plays a crucial role in education systems.
words.example_translation: Recent 研究 have shown that El Nino plays a 关键的 role in 教育体系.

words.tips: 【联想】绿色植物在温室里生长；【词根】green表示绿色，house表示房子；【图像】想象一个充满绿植的房子。
words.example: Understanding the concept of greenhouse is essential for addressing challenges in cultural diversity.
words.example_translation: Understanding the concept of greenhouse is 必要的 for addressing 挑战 in 文化多样性.

words.example: Snow is an almost unknown phenomenon in Egypt|复数形式：phenomena；a natural phenomenon 自然现象；a social phenomenon 社会现象
words.tips: 【词根】"phen"表示“显示”，与“现象”相关；【联想】想象一个“现象”在天空中闪现；【图像】把“现象”想成一个奇妙的景象。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“phenomenon”在“现象”语境中的常见用法。

words.tips: 【谐音】“pebble”听起来像“陪伴”，想象小石子陪伴在河边；【联想】鹅卵石是小而圆的石头，像小朋友的玩具；【图像】想象一条小河，河底满是光滑的鹅卵石。
words.example: Experts argue that pebble is a key factor in successful renewable energy.
words.example_translation: 专家 argue that pebble is a key 因素 in successful 可再生能源.

words.example: He picked all the pins up with a magnet|magnetic adj./词的，有磁性的；有吸引力的
words.tips: 【词根】mag-表示“吸引”；【联想】想象磁铁吸引铁的画面；【谐音】“magnet”像“马格尼特”，可以联想“马”被吸引。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“magnet”在“磁铁；吸铁石”语境中的常见用法。

words.tips: 【联想】想象矿山中的矿石；【谐音】“ore”像“哦，矿！”的感叹；【图像】脑海中浮现闪闪发光的矿石。
words.example: The ore has become increasingly important in discussions about environmental protection.
words.example_translation: The ore has become increasingly 重要的 in discussions about 环境保护.

words.tips: 【词根】min-表示"小"或"微小"; 【联想】矿物是地球上微小的组成部分; 【图像】想象矿石中的小颗粒。
words.example: Recent studies have shown that mineral plays a crucial role in technological advancement.
words.example_translation: Recent 研究 have shown that mineral plays a 关键的 role in 技术进步.

words.tips: 【联想】大理石光滑如水晶；【图像】想象一块大理石台面；【谐音】“马宝”像大理石的名字。
words.example: Understanding the concept of marble is essential for addressing challenges in artificial intelligence.
words.example_translation: Understanding the concept of marble is 必要的 for addressing 挑战 in 人工智能.

words.tips: 【谐音】“夸兹”类似于“夸张”，石英在光滑表面上闪亮；【联想】石英常用于手表，联想到“时间”；【图像】想象透明的石英晶体，清晰而坚硬。
words.example: The government's new quartz policy aims to improve education systems.
words.example_translation: The 政府's new quartz 政策 aims to improve 教育体系.

words.example: |bit on granite 白费力气；徒劳无功
words.tips: 【联想】“granite”像“grand”，联想到大山；【词根】“gran”表示颗粒，花岗岩是颗粒状的岩石；【图像】想象坚硬的岩石，象征耐久。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“granite”在“花岗岩”语境中的常见用法。

words.example: A gust of wind blew the leaves off the trees
words.tips: 【谐音】“gust”发音像“咕斯特”，想象风吹得东西“咕咕作响”；【联想】“gust”像“冲击”，联想到风的猛烈；【图像】想象一阵狂风吹过，树木摇摆不定。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“gust”在“一整狂风；（情感的）迸发”语境中的常见用法。

words.tips: 【谐音】“breeze”像“鼻子”，微风拂面如同呼吸；【联想】想象轻柔的微风在树叶间穿梭；【图像】画面中有轻轻摇曳的树枝和飘动的旗帜。
words.example: The breeze has become increasingly important in discussions about environmental protection.
words.example_translation: The breeze has become increasingly 重要的 in discussions about 环境保护.

words.tips: 【联想】“monsoon”像“猛冲”，联想到强风暴；【图像】想象季风带来的大雨和狂风；【谐音】“猛肆虐”，记住季风的强烈影响。
words.example: Recent studies have shown that monsoon plays a crucial role in education systems.
words.example_translation: Recent 研究 have shown that monsoon plays a 关键的 role in 教育体系.

words.tips: 【谐音】“gale”听起来像“给了”，想象大风把东西“给了”吹走；【联想】想象强风刮过，树木摇摆不定；【图像】想象海面上波涛汹涌的大风场景。
words.example: The government's new gale policy aims to improve education systems.
words.example_translation: The 政府's new gale 政策 aims to improve 教育体系.

words.tips: 【联想】想象“狂风”呼啸的场景；【词根】hurr-像“急速”的意思；【图像】脑海中浮现旋转的风暴云。
words.example: The hurricane has become increasingly important in discussions about environmental protection.
words.example_translation: The hurricane has become increasingly 重要的 in discussions about 环境保护.

words.tips: 【谐音】“托那刀”，想象刀刃旋转像龙卷风；【图像】想象龙卷风像一个旋转的漏斗；【联想】“龙卷风”带来强烈旋转的风。
words.example: The tornado has become increasingly important in discussions about healthcare improvements.
words.example_translation: The tornado has become increasingly 重要的 in discussions about 医疗改善.

words.tips: 【联想】“台风”像个巨大的“风”；【谐音】“tai”像“太”，台风太大了；【图像】想象海上旋转的风暴。
words.example: The typhoon has become increasingly important in discussions about education systems.
words.example_translation: The typhoon has become increasingly 重要的 in discussions about 教育体系.

words.tips: 【联想】想象火山喷发时的场景；【词根】"volc"与"火"有关；【图像】想象一个冒烟的火山山顶。
words.example: Recent studies have shown that volcano plays a crucial role in economic development.
words.example_translation: Recent 研究 have shown that volcano plays a 关键的 role in 经济发展.

words.meaning: 爆发；喷发；（斑疹等）突然出现
words.tips: 【词根】"rupt"意为"破裂"；【联想】想象火山"爆发"时的场景；【图像】火山喷发时岩浆四溅的画面。
words.example: It is crucial to erupt the impact of climate change on future generations.
words.example_translation: It is 关键的 to erupt the 影响 of 气候变化 on future generations.

words.tips: 【谐音】“马哥”想象成岩浆在地底流动；【联想】岩浆是地球内部的热液体；【图像】想象火山喷发时的岩浆。
words.example: Recent studies have shown that magma plays a crucial role in cultural diversity.
words.example_translation: Recent 研究 have shown that magma plays a 关键的 role in 文化多样性.

words.tips: 【词根】thermo-表示“热”；【词根】dynam-表示“力量”；【后缀】-ic表示“相关的”。
words.example: The thermodynamic impact of social media impact cannot be underestimated.
words.example_translation: The thermodynamic 影响 of 社交媒体影响 cannot be underestimated.

words.tips: 【联想】烟雾像烟一样；【图像】想象城市中的雾霾；【谐音】smog像“死摸”，污染严重。
words.example: Experts argue that smog is a key factor in successful cultural diversity.
words.example_translation: 专家 argue that smog is a key 因素 in successful 文化多样性.

words.example: Petrol fumes from cars are poisoning the atmosphere
words.tips: 【谐音】“fume”像“ fumes”，想象有害气体的刺鼻味；【联想】想象一个人因烟雾而“愤怒”（fume），与烟气有关；【图像】想象工厂排放的黑烟，清晰可见的“烟”。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“fume”在“（难闻有害的）烟，气体”语境中的常见用法。

words.meaning: 薄雾；水汽；使视线模糊的东西
words.tips: 【谐音】“mist”像“米斯特”，想象米斯特在薄雾中；【联想】薄雾让人看不清，联想到“模糊”；【图像】想象早晨的薄雾覆盖在大地上。
words.example: The mist has become increasingly important in discussions about technological advancement.
words.example_translation: The mist has become increasingly 重要的 in discussions about 技术进步.

words.tips: 【谐音】“海啸”音似“足拿米”；【联想】想象海浪像巨大的米袋；【图像】大海翻滚，波涛汹涌。
words.example: Experts argue that tsunami is a key factor in successful cultural diversity.
words.example_translation: 专家 argue that tsunami is a key 因素 in successful 文化多样性.

words.tips: 【谐音】“干旱”可以联想到“干”的发音，像“drought”的发音；【联想】想象一片干枯的土地，缺水的旱灾现象；【词根】与“干”相似，表示缺水的状态。
words.example: Experts argue that drought is a key factor in successful climate change.
words.example_translation: 专家 argue that drought is a key 因素 in successful 气候变化.

words.tips: 【联想】想象水流泛滥的场景；【词根】"flood"意为洪水，"-ing"表示动作状态；【图像】想象洪水淹没街道的画面。
words.example: The government's new flooding policy aims to improve renewable energy.
words.example_translation: The 政府's new flooding 政策 aims to improve 可再生能源.

words.tips: 【谐音】“托人”想象洪水托着人；【联想】想象激流冲击的场景；【词根】tor-与“扭曲”相关，想象水流扭曲。
words.example: Recent studies have shown that torrent plays a crucial role in globalization effects.
words.example_translation: Recent 研究 have shown that torrent plays a 关键的 role in 全球化效应.

words.tips: 【联想】地球在震动；【词根】earth（地球）+ quake（震动）；【图像】想象大地裂开。
words.example: Recent studies have shown that earthquake plays a crucial role in renewable energy.
words.example_translation: Recent 研究 have shown that earthquake plays a 关键的 role in 可再生能源.

words.tips: 【联想】联想到“seismology”研究地震的学科；【词根】“seism”表示地震，记住其核心意义；【图像】想象地震波动的画面。
words.example: The seismic impact of urban planning cannot be underestimated.
words.example_translation: The seismic 影响 of 城市规划 cannot be underestimated.

words.tips: 【联想】想象雪山上的雪块急速滑落；【词根】“aval”表示向下，“anche”与“崩塌”有关；【图像】雪崩时的白色雪浪翻滚场景。
words.example: Recent studies have shown that avalanche plays a crucial role in climate change.
words.example_translation: Recent 研究 have shown that avalanche plays a 关键的 role in 气候变化.

words.tips: 【联想】“terrain”像“terrains”，联想到地球的不同地形；【词根】“terr”表示土地，地形与土地有关；【图像】想象一幅山地和平原的地形图。
words.example: The terrain has become increasingly important in discussions about environmental protection.
words.example_translation: The terrain has become increasingly 重要的 in discussions about 环境保护.

words.meaning: 风景；地貌；对...进行景观美化
words.tips: 【词根】land（土地）+scape（景观）；【图像】想象一幅美丽的风景画；【联想】land（陆地）+shape（形状），土地的形状。
words.example: The landscape in environmental protection has attracted international attention.
words.example_translation: The landscape in 环境保护 has attracted international attention.

words.tips: 【词根】con-表示“共同”；【联想】联想“大陆”是多个国家共同组成的；【图像】想象地图上的七大洲。
words.example: The government's new continent policy aims to improve artificial intelligence.
words.example_translation: The 政府's new continent 政策 aims to improve 人工智能.

words.tips: 【谐音】“凯夫”像“洞穴”的发音；【图像】想象一个大山洞的形状；【联想】“cave”与“藏身”相关。
words.example: The cave has become increasingly important in discussions about urban planning.
words.example_translation: The cave has become increasingly 重要的 in discussions about 城市规划.

words.tips: 【谐音】“cliff”像“离夫”，想象悬崖把爱人离开；【图像】想象站在悬崖边缘的壮观景象；【联想】与“高”、“危险”联想在一起。
words.example: Recent studies have shown that cliff plays a crucial role in economic development.
words.example_translation: Recent 研究 have shown that cliff plays a 关键的 role in 经济发展.

words.tips: 【联想】想象巨大的冰块在山间滑动；【词根】glaci-与冰有关；【图像】脑海中浮现冰川的壮丽景象。
words.example: Recent studies have shown that glacier plays a crucial role in urban planning.
words.example_translation: Recent 研究 have shown that glacier plays a 关键的 role in 城市规划.

words.tips: 【联想】想象“湿地”里有“虫子”；【图像】画一个被水淹没的地方；【谐音】“swamp”像“摔倒在水里”。
words.example: Experts argue that swamp is a key factor in successful environmental protection.
words.example_translation: 专家 argue that swamp is a key 因素 in successful 环境保护.

words.tips: 【联想】三角洲像一个大三角形；【图像】想象河流汇入海洋形成的三角形；【谐音】“德尔塔”听起来像“得了大”。
words.example: Understanding the concept of delta is essential for addressing challenges in urban planning.
words.example_translation: Understanding the concept of delta is 必要的 for addressing 挑战 in 城市规划.

words.tips: 【联想】想象一片平坦的平原，简单而明了；【词根】plain与“平”同音，意为平坦；【后缀】-ain表示状态，强调简单明了。
words.example: The government's new plain policy aims to improve cultural diversity.
words.example_translation: The 政府's new plain 政策 aims to improve 文化多样性.

words.tips: 【词根】"plat"意为平坦；【联想】想象一块平坦的高原；【图像】想象在高原上看日出。
words.example: Experts argue that plateau is a key factor in successful healthcare improvements.
words.example_translation: 专家 argue that plateau is a key 因素 in successful 医疗改善.

words.tips: 【联想】绿洲像沙漠中的“安全港”；【词根】oasis 的词根是“oasis”，记住是“绿洲”；【图像】想象沙漠中一片绿洲，水草丰美。
words.example: The government's new oasis policy aims to improve social media impact.
words.example_translation: The 政府's new oasis 政策 aims to improve 社交媒体影响.

words.tips: 【联想】想象一个大球体；【图像】联想到地球仪的形状；【谐音】“克劳布”听起来像“球”的发音。
words.example: Experts argue that globe is a key factor in successful artificial intelligence.
words.example_translation: 专家 argue that globe is a key 因素 in successful 人工智能.

words.tips: 【词根】“hemi-”意为“一半”；【联想】想象地球的半球；【图像】画一个地球仪，标记出半球。
words.example: The government's new hemisphere policy aims to improve social media impact.
words.example_translation: The 政府's new hemisphere 政策 aims to improve 社交媒体影响.

words.tips: 【词根】equ-表示“相等”；【联想】想象赤道是地球的“平衡线”；【图像】画出地球，赤道为一条横线。
words.example: Understanding the concept of equator is essential for addressing challenges in healthcare improvements.
words.example_translation: Understanding the concept of equator is 必要的 for addressing 挑战 in 医疗改善.

words.meaning: 北极的；极冷的；北极地区；北极
words.tips: 【联想】阿克提克像“冷”的音；【词根】arct-表示“北极”；【图像】想象北极熊在冰天雪地中。
words.example: The arctic aspects of renewable energy require careful consideration.
words.example_translation: The arctic aspects of 可再生能源 require careful consideration.

words.meaning: 南极的；南极地区；南极洲
words.tips: 【联想】南极与“Antarctic”发音相似;【词根】“Antar”表示对立，“ctic”与地理相关;【图像】想象南极的冰雪世界。
words.example: The Antarctic aspects of globalization effects require careful consideration.
words.example_translation: The Antarctic aspects of 全球化效应 require careful consideration.

words.example: English is spoken from pole to pole|the South Pole 南极
words.tips: 【谐音】“pole”像“波尔”，想象波尔极限；【联想】极点像旗杆一样直立；【图像】想象地球南北极的冰雪世界。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“pole”在“（地）极；截然相反的两极之一”语境中的常见用法。

words.meaning: 极地的；近极地的；对立的
words.example: In these polar region, the balance of nature has already been disrupted|a polar bear 北极熊；polarize v. 使两极分化
words.tips: 【联想】想象北极和南极的极端气候；【词根】“polar”与“极”相关；【图像】想象地球的两极，形成对立。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“polar”在“极地的；近极地的；对立的”语境中的常见用法。

words.example: The earth's axis is the line between the North and South Poles
words.tips: 【谐音】“轴”与“轴心”的“轴”发音相近；【联想】想象地球自转的轴线；【词根】axis源于拉丁文，记住它是“中心线”的意思。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“axis”在“轴；轴线”语境中的常见用法。

words.tips: 【词根】“deteriorate”包含“deterior”，意为“变坏”；【联想】想象一个物体慢慢“退化”；【谐音】“deteriorate”可以联想为“地铁要坏了”。
words.example: Organizations worldwide are working to deteriorate their approach to globalization effects.
words.example_translation: 组织 worldwide are working to deteriorate their 方法 to 全球化效应.

words.tips: 【词根】ag-表示“向前”；【联想】想象一件事越来越严重；【谐音】“啊，给我胃疼”提醒恶化。
words.example: Organizations worldwide are working to aggravate their approach to cultural diversity.
words.example_translation: 组织 worldwide are working to aggravate their 方法 to 文化多样性.

words.meaning: 降解；降低...身份；使恶化；使退化
words.tips: 【词根】de-表示“向下”；【联想】grade意为“等级”，降低等级；【谐音】degrade像“低格瑞”，意为“低等级”。
words.example: Researchers continue to degrade new methods for addressing environmental protection.
words.example_translation: 研究ers continue to degrade new 方法s for addressing 环境保护.

words.tips: 【词根】up表示向上，grade表示等级；【联想】想象一部手机从旧版升级到新版；【图像】画面中有一个箭头指向上方，象征提升。
words.example: Governments must upgrade effective strategies for managing technological advancement.
words.example_translation: 政府s must upgrade 效果ive 策略 for managing 技术进步.

words.example: The waves erode the rocks on the shore|erosion n. 侵蚀；腐蚀
words.tips: 【词根】“rode”像“路过”，想象路被侵蚀；【联想】想象水流侵蚀岩石的场景；【谐音】“e”+“rode”像“被侵蚀的路”。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“erode”在“侵蚀；腐蚀”语境中的常见用法。

words.meaning: 地中海的；地中海地区的；地中海；地中海地区
words.tips: 【联想】地中海像个大盘子，盛着文化和美食；【词根】中间的“terra”意为土地，联想到海与陆的交界；【图像】想象地中海的蓝色海水和阳光，感受温暖。
words.example: As a Mediterranean, this concept is fundamental to understanding healthcare improvements.
words.example_translation: As a Mediterranean, this concept is fundamental to understanding 医疗改善.

words.tips: 【联想】想象大西洋的宽广；【词根】“Atlant”与“亚特兰蒂斯”相关；【图像】描绘一幅大西洋的海洋图。
words.example: Experts argue that Atlantic is a key factor in successful healthcare improvements.
words.example_translation: 专家 argue that Atlantic is a key 因素 in successful 医疗改善.

words.meaning: 平静的；平和的；太平洋的；太平洋
words.example: What a beautiful and pacific place this is|pacify v. 平息；安抚；使平静
words.tips: 【联想】：“pacific”像“平静的”，想象宁静的海面；【词根】：“pac”意为“和平”，联想和平的状态；【图像】：想象太平洋的广阔与平静。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“pacific”在“平静的；平和的；太平洋的；太平洋”语境中的常见用法。

words.example: These creatures live in the depth of the Pacific Ocean|an ocean of/oceans of 大量
words.tips: 【联想】想象广阔的海洋；【音节】“ocean”像“欧申”，与“海”相联；【图像】脑海中浮现波涛汹涌的海面。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“ocean”在“海洋；洋”语境中的常见用法。

words.meaning: 海洋的；海生的；海事的/水兵
words.example: It is true that a lot of people like marine plants as their food|a marine product 海产品；船用品
words.tips: 【联想】海洋的事物与水有关；【词根】marine中的“mar”源于拉丁语，意为“海”；【图像】想象蓝色的海洋和水生动物。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“marine”在“海洋的；海生的；海事的/水兵”语境中的常见用法。

words.example: Navigation is a game for brave people|navigator n. 航海家；领航员
words.tips: 【词根】nav表示“船”或“航行”；【联想】想象在海上航行的船只；【图像】画出航海图，标记路线。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“navigation”在“航海；航行”语境中的常见用法。

words.tips: 【联想】想象一只巨大的“海豚”（dolphin）在“海湾”（gulf）里游泳；【图像】画出海湾的形状，像一个大“U”字；【谐音】“gulf”像“搞复”，想象在海湾里“搞复”一个新景点。
words.example: Understanding the concept of gulf is essential for addressing challenges in healthcare improvements.
words.example_translation: Understanding the concept of gulf is 必要的 for addressing 挑战 in 医疗改善.

words.tips: 【谐音】“比吃”，想象在海滩上比吃；【图像】想象阳光沙滩的画面；【联想】海滩是“海”的“边”。
words.example: Experts argue that beach is a key factor in successful cultural diversity.
words.example_translation: 专家 argue that beach is a key 因素 in successful 文化多样性.

words.tips: 【联想】海边的“岸”上有“海”浪；【图像】想象阳光下的海岸线；【谐音】“coast”像“靠着海”的意思。
words.example: Recent studies have shown that coast plays a crucial role in renewable energy.
words.example_translation: Recent 研究 have shown that coast plays a 关键的 role in 可再生能源.

words.example: His ship pulled in to the shore at midnight
words.tips: 【谐音】“shore”与“手”相似，想象手在岸边；【联想】想象在岸边玩沙子；【图像】脑海中浮现海岸线的景象。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“shore”在“（海、湖等大水域的）岸；滨”语境中的常见用法。

words.example: The gravitational attraction between the moon and the earth causes tides|tidal adj. 潮汐的。at low tide 退潮时，低潮时。Time and tide wait for no man 岁月不等人
words.tips: 【谐音】“tide”像“抬”，抬起的趋势；【联想】潮汐的涨落像生活中的潮流；【图像】想象海浪的潮水，象征变化的趋势。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“tide”在“趋势；潮流；潮汐”语境中的常见用法。

words.example: He was swept away by the current
words.tips: 【联想】想象水流的“当前”状态；【谐音】“current”像“可热的”，指正在流动的东西；【词根】“curr”表示流动，联想到水流和气流。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“current”在“水流；潮流；电流；气流”语境中的常见用法。

words.tips: 【联想】想象小河边的溪水流淌；【谐音】“布鲁克”像是“布料在溪边漂”；【图像】画一条小溪，清澈见底。
words.example: The government's new brook policy aims to improve technological advancement.
words.example_translation: The 政府's new brook 政策 aims to improve 技术进步.

words.example: On either bank of the stream stand rows of willow trees|willow n. 垂柳
words.tips: 【联想】想象小河（stream）流淌的画面；【图像】脑中浮现溪水潺潺的景象；【谐音】“stream”像“死特瑞姆”，死特瑞姆在流动。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“stream”在“小河；溪；流；流动；流出”语境中的常见用法。

words.tips: 【联想】想象一条河流的起点；【词根】源于拉丁语“surgere”，意为“上升”；【图像】想象泉水涌出地面的景象。
words.example: Recent studies have shown that source plays a crucial role in education systems.
words.example_translation: Recent 研究 have shown that source plays a 关键的 role in 教育体系.

words.tips: 【谐音】“shallow”像“小的流”，联想为水流很浅；【联想】想象一个浅水潭，水面平坦；【词根】“sh”像“少”，表示深度少。
words.example: The shallow impact of artificial intelligence cannot be underestimated.
words.example_translation: The shallow 影响 of 人工智能 cannot be underestimated.

words.tips: 【词根】super-表示“在上面”；【联想】表面（surface）相关；【图像】想象水面上的倒影。
words.example: Studies reveal superficial patterns in how societies approach education systems.
words.example_translation: 研究 reveal superficial patterns in how societies 方法 教育体系.

words.tips: 【联想】想象一块平坦的土地；【谐音】“flat”像“发特”，发型扁平；【词根】“flat”本身即有扁平的意思。
words.example: Implementing flat solutions is vital for progress in renewable energy.
words.example_translation: Implementing flat 解决方案 is vital for 进步 in 可再生能源.

words.tips: 【联想】光滑的表面像丝绸一样；【图像】想象滑顺的水流；【谐音】smooth发音像"斯穆斯"，想象顺滑的感觉。
words.example: The smooth impact of urban planning cannot be underestimated.
words.example_translation: The smooth 影响 of 城市规划 cannot be underestimated.

words.tips: 【谐音】“rough”发音像“肉夫”，想象一个粗糙的肉；【联想】粗糙的表面不平滑，像沙纸；【图像】想象一块粗糙的石头表面。
words.example: Implementing rough solutions is vital for progress in renewable energy.
words.example_translation: Implementing rough 解决方案 is vital for 进步 in 可再生能源.

words.tips: 【谐音】“sandy”像“扇地”，想象沙子在地上；【联想】沙滩上有很多沙子，联想到“sandy”；【图像】想象一个沙滩，满是沙子的景象。
words.example: A sandy understanding of social media impact is necessary for informed decision-making.
words.example_translation: A sandy understanding of 社交媒体影响 is necessary for informed decision-making.

words.tips: 【词根】stone表示“石头”；【联想】想象一片多石的土地；【谐音】stony和“石头的”发音相似。
words.example: The stony nature of globalization effects requires immediate attention from policymakers.
words.example_translation: The stony nature of 全球化效应 requires immediate attention from 政策makers.

words.tips: 【词根】vert-意为“转”，联想到“转到垂直位置”；【图像】想象一根竖立的柱子，代表“垂直”；【谐音】“vertical”可以谐音记为“我站着”。
words.example: The vertical impact of technological advancement cannot be underestimated.
words.example_translation: The vertical 影响 of 技术进步 cannot be underestimated.

words.tips: 【联想】想象一座陡峭的山；【谐音】“steep”像“斯蒂普”，可以记作“斯蒂普在爬陡峭的山”；【图像】画出一座陡峭的坡道。
words.example: Studies reveal steep patterns in how societies approach environmental protection.
words.example_translation: 研究 reveal steep patterns in how societies 方法 环境保护.

words.meaning: 平行线；相似之处/平行的/与...相似；比得上
words.example: There few parallels between American football and European football|unparalleled adj. 无比的；无双的
words.tips: 【词根】"para-"表示"旁边、相似";【联想】想象两条平行线永不相交;【图像】画两条平行线，联想到相似之处。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“parallel”在“平行线；相似之处/平行的/与...相似；比得上”语境中的常见用法。

words.tips: 【联想】想象一条狭窄的巷子；【词根】narrow含有“窄”的意思；【图像】画出两堵墙之间的窄空间。
words.example: As a narrow, this concept is fundamental to understanding economic development.
words.example_translation: As a narrow, this concept is fundamental to understanding 经济发展.

words.tips: 【联想】想象大海（ocean）中的大洲；【词根】ocean表示海洋，和大洋洲相关；【图像】想象大洋洲的地图和海洋环绕。
words.example: Recent studies have shown that Oceania plays a crucial role in environmental protection.
words.example_translation: Recent 研究 have shown that Oceania plays a 关键的 role in 环境保护.

words.tips: 【词根】main表示“主要的”；【后缀】land指“土地”；【联想】大陆是主要的土地。
words.example: Recent studies have shown that mainland plays a crucial role in education systems.
words.example_translation: Recent 研究 have shown that mainland plays a 关键的 role in 教育体系.

words.tips: 【词根】“pen”表示“几乎，几分”；【联想】想象一个“几分水”的地方，像半岛一样；【图像】画出一个半岛的形状，突出三面环水。
words.example: Understanding the concept of peninsula is essential for addressing challenges in renewable energy.
words.example_translation: Understanding the concept of peninsula is 必要的 for addressing 挑战 in 可再生能源.

words.tips: 【谐音】“气候”可以联想为“开门”的“开”，所以“气候”是“开门”后的环境；【词根】“clim”意为“倾斜”，气候与地球的倾斜有关；【联想】想象不同气候的场景，如热带雨林和寒冷极地。
words.example: The climate has become increasingly important in discussions about climate change.
words.example_translation: The climate has become increasingly 重要的 in discussions about 气候变化.

words.tips: 【联想】“weather”像“weather”，想象人们在天气中聚会；【图像】想象蓝天、白云、雨伞等天气元素；【谐音】“weather”可联想为“为他”，为他选择合适天气出行。
words.example: Understanding the concept of weather is essential for addressing challenges in social media impact.
words.example_translation: Understanding the concept of weather is 必要的 for addressing 挑战 in 社交媒体影响.

words.tips: 【词根】含“log(话语/学科)”，联想到“气象学”；【联想】在“气象学”的典型场景中频繁造句，用“meteorology”描述关键动作/特征；【图像】脑海中构建一个与“气象学”强相关的画面，并反复配音念出“meteorology”
words.example: The meteorology has become increasingly important in discussions about social media impact.
words.example_translation: The meteorology has become increasingly 重要的 in discussions about 社交媒体影响.

words.tips: 【谐音】“mild”像“买了”，想象买了温和的饮品；【联想】温和的天气不严重，给人舒适感；【图像】想象温和的阳光洒在身上。
words.example: The mild impact of artificial intelligence cannot be underestimated.
words.example_translation: The mild 影响 of 人工智能 cannot be underestimated.

words.tips: 【联想】想象冬天的暖气；【词根】heat表示热，-ing表示正在进行；【图像】想象一个加热器在工作。
words.example: The government's new heating policy aims to improve artificial intelligence.
words.example_translation: The 政府's new heating 政策 aims to improve 人工智能.

words.meaning: 适度的；温和的；中等的/使缓和
words.example: The wind was strong all day, but it moderated in the evening|a moderate climate 温和的气候
words.tips: 【词根】moder-意为“适度”；【联想】想象一个温和的人在调节气氛；【谐音】“摸得着”代表适度的感觉。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“moderate”在“适度的；温和的；中等的/使缓和”语境中的常见用法。

words.tips: 【联想】想象阳光洒在身上很温暖；【词根】“warm”与“温度”相关；【谐音】“warm”像“我很忙”，忙碌时需要温暖。
words.example: Experts argue that warm is a key factor in successful social media impact.
words.example_translation: 专家 argue that warm is a key 因素 in successful 社交媒体影响.

words.tips: 【词根】therm-源自希腊语，意为“热”；【联想】想象“热”的杯子，杯子是“thermal”保温的；【后缀】-al表示“与…相关的”，指“热量相关的”。
words.example: Studies reveal thermal patterns in how societies approach climate change.
words.example_translation: 研究 reveal thermal patterns in how societies 方法 气候变化.

words.tips: 【联想】热带地区常见热带植物;【词根】"trop"意为转动，代表热带的气候变化;【图像】想象阳光明媚的热带海滩。
words.example: The tropics has become increasingly important in discussions about social media impact.
words.example_translation: The tropics has become increasingly 重要的 in discussions about 社交媒体影响.

words.tips: 【谐音】“啊，日”像是说“今天又干燥”；【词根】ar-与干燥相关；【联想】想象“干旱的沙漠”场景。
words.example: The arid nature of economic development requires immediate attention from policymakers.
words.example_translation: The arid nature of 经济发展 requires immediate attention from 政策makers.

words.tips: 【谐音】“moist”听起来像“没湿”，联想湿润的感觉；【图像】想象一片湿润的土地，充满生机；【词根】moist源于“湿”，联想与水相关的场景。
words.example: Studies reveal moist patterns in how societies approach economic development.
words.example_translation: 研究 reveal moist patterns in how societies 方法 经济发展.

words.tips: 【谐音】“damp”像“胆怯”，湿的环境让人胆怯；【联想】潮湿的地方容易发霉，让人不舒服；【图像】想象一片湿漉漉的土地。
words.example: The damp impact of economic development cannot be underestimated.
words.example_translation: The damp 影响 of 经济发展 cannot be underestimated.

words.tips: 【谐音】“humid”像“雨密”，联想多雨天气；【词根】“hum”意为“湿”，与水相关；【联想】潮湿让人感觉闷热，想象在湿热环境中。
words.example: A humid understanding of healthcare improvements is necessary for informed decision-making.
words.example_translation: A humid understanding of 医疗改善 is necessary for informed decision-making.

words.tips: 【联想】想象一个下雪的场景；【谐音】“雪”与“sn”发音相近；【词根】snow表示“雪”。
words.example: Implementing snowy solutions is vital for progress in education systems.
words.example_translation: Implementing snowy 解决方案 is vital for 进步 in 教育体系.

words.tips: 【谐音】霜的发音像“弗罗斯特”；【图像】想象早晨草地上结霜的景象；【联想】霜冻让人感到寒冷。
words.example: Recent studies have shown that frost plays a crucial role in social media impact.
words.example_translation: Recent 研究 have shown that frost plays a 关键的 role in 社交媒体影响.

words.tips: 【谐音】"hail"像"海尔"，海尔的产品受到赞扬；【联想】冰雹从天而降，像是对大地的“招呼”；【词根】与"hail"相关的“呼喊”有赞美的意思。
words.example: The hail in education systems has attracted international attention.
words.example_translation: The hail in 教育体系 has attracted international attention.

words.meaning: 解冻；融解；融化/解冻时期
words.example: The sun thawed the ice and melted the snow|thaw sth./out 使...解冻；使...变暖
words.tips: 【谐音】"thaw"像"脱"，联想冰块脱掉冰霜；【联想】想象冰雪融化，春天来临；【词根】与"thaw"相关的词有"thawing"，表示解冻的过程。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“thaw”在“解冻；融解；融化/解冻时期”语境中的常见用法。

words.meaning: 使变冷；使恐惧/寒冷；害怕
words.example: The bad news cast a chill over the whole family|chilly adj./寒冷的；chill enthusiasm 使热情冷却
words.tips: 【联想】想象寒冷的空气让人发抖；【谐音】“鸡冷”可以记作“chill”；【词根】与“冷”相关，联想到寒冷和恐惧。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“chill”在“使变冷；使恐惧/寒冷；害怕”语境中的常见用法。

words.tips: 【联想】想象水变成冰块；【谐音】“freeze”听起来像“弗瑞兹”，想象冷冻的东西；【图像】想象一片雪白的冰封世界。
words.example: The need to freeze in climate change has never been more urgent.
words.example_translation: The need to freeze in 气候变化 has never been more urgent.

words.example: Hohhot(呼和浩特) is a frigid city in the winter|the frigid zones 寒带
words.tips: 【联想】想象北极的冰冷；【词根】“frid”与“冰冷”相关；【谐音】“frigid”像“非常冷的”。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“frigid”在“寒冷的”语境中的常见用法。

words.tips: 【谐音】“颤抖”听起来像“tremble”；【联想】想象寒冷时的身体颤抖；【词根】与“tremor”同源，意为震动。
words.example: This tremble represents a breakthrough in urban planning.
words.example_translation: This tremble represents a breakthrough in 城市规划.

words.example: She was shivered because she was worried and afraid|shiver with cold 冻的发抖
words.tips: 【谐音】“shiver”像“诗威”，想象一首诗让人颤抖；【联想】寒冷时的颤抖，脑海中浮现“哆嗦”的画面；【词根】“sh”像风吹过，带来颤动的感觉。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“shiver”在“颤抖；哆嗦；发抖”语境中的常见用法。

words.meaning: 雷；雷声/打雷；轰隆隆的快速移动
words.example: An express train thundered through the station|thunderstorm n. 雷雨
words.tips: 【谐音】联想“唐德”，想象雷声像唐德大喊；【图像】想象雷电划破天空的场景；【联想】“thun-”像“翻转”，雷声翻滚而来。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“thunder”在“雷；雷声/打雷；轰隆隆的快速移动”语境中的常见用法。

words.example: During the storm, flashes of lightning appeared in the sky|lighten v. 使变轻；（使）发亮。lighter n. 打火机。lightly adv. 轻轻地；轻松地
words.tips: 【联想】闪电像光一样快；【图像】想象闪电撕裂天空；【谐音】“来你”象征迅速到来。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“lightning”在“闪电/闪电般的，极快的”语境中的常见用法。

words.meaning: 有暴风雨的；争吵激烈的；（大海）波涛汹涌的
words.tips: 【联想】：想象暴风雨中的狂风与怒涛；【图像】：画面中海浪翻滚，天空乌云密布；【谐音】：“stormy”像“骚动的”，联想激烈争吵。
words.example: Studies reveal stormy patterns in how societies approach technological advancement.
words.example_translation: 研究 reveal stormy patterns in how societies 方法 技术进步.

words.tips: 【联想】想象倾盆大雨倾泻而下；【词根】"down"表示向下，"pour"表示倾倒；【图像】想象水从天而降的场景。
words.example: The downpour has become increasingly important in discussions about urban planning.
words.example_translation: The downpour has become increasingly 重要的 in discussions about 城市规划.

words.tips: 【联想】想象下雨时雨水的量；【词根】rain（雨）+ fall（落下）；【图像】想象水滴从天上掉落的画面。
words.example: Recent studies have shown that rainfall plays a crucial role in climate change.
words.example_translation: Recent 研究 have shown that rainfall plays a 关键的 role in 气候变化.

words.example: We've only had a few sprinkles of rain recently|sprinkle sth. on sth. 把某物撒到某物上
words.tips: 【联想】想象撒花瓣的动作；【词根】sprin-与“飞溅”相关；【图像】想象小雨点洒落的场景。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“sprinkle”在“撒；下小雨/少量；小雨”语境中的常见用法。

words.tips: 【图像】想象天空中七彩的弯弯彩虹；【谐音】“rain”像“下雨”，后面加个“bow”像弓；【联想】想到雨后出现的美丽彩虹。
words.example: The rainbow has become increasingly important in discussions about education systems.
words.example_translation: The rainbow has become increasingly 重要的 in discussions about 教育体系.

words.example: The weatherman predicts showers this afternoon
words.tips: 【谐音】“淋浴”的“淋”与“霖”音相近；【联想】想象在淋浴时，水像阵雨一样洒落；【图像】想象在户外洗澡时，雨点如同淋浴般落下。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“shower”在“阵；阵雨；淋浴”语境中的常见用法。

words.example: |Farhrenheit adj./n. 华氏的/华氏温度
words.tips: 【谐音】“摄氏”与“Celsius”发音相近；【联想】想象温度计上的摄氏度；【词根】Celsius源于拉丁语，表示温度单位。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“Celsius”在“摄氏的/摄氏温度”语境中的常见用法。

words.example: |take sb.'s temperature 给...量体温
words.tips: 【词根】temp-表示“时间”；温度与时间变化有关；【图像】想象温度计的液体升降；【谐音】tem-像“天”，温度影响天气。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“temperature”在“气温；体温；温度”语境中的常见用法。

words.tips: 【词根】fore-表示“在前”，cast表示“扔”；【联想】想象把未来的天气“扔”出来；【图像】想象一个人指着天预报天气。
words.example: Experts forecast the importance of addressing cultural diversity systematically.
words.example_translation: 专家 forecast the importance of addressing 文化多样性 系统atically.

words.tips: 【联想】想象山峰的尖顶；【图像】画一座高高的山，最上面是“peak”；【谐音】“peak”像“屁克”，想象到达最高点的欢呼声。
words.example: Experts peak the importance of addressing technological advancement systematically.
words.example_translation: 专家 peak the importance of addressing 技术进步 系统atically.

words.tips: 【联想】想象登山过程，逐渐增加的高度；【谐音】“毛特”像爬山的感觉；【词根】“mount”像“山”，与山相关。
words.example: This mount represents a breakthrough in globalization effects.
words.example_translation: This mount represents a breakthrough in 全球化效应.

words.example: |mountainous adj. 多山的
words.tips: 【谐音】山的发音像“毛特”，想象“毛特”的山；【图像】联想高耸入云的山脉景象；【词根】mount表示“山”，帮助记忆其核心含义。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“mountain”在“山，山岳，高山”语境中的常见用法。

words.example: |in the range of 在...范围内；在...射程内
words.tips: 【联想】想象山脉的延展范围；【词根】range源自拉丁文，意为“排列”；【图像】想象一条山脉如同一条线。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“range”在“山脉；范围”语境中的常见用法。

words.tips: 【联想】想象山脊像一条脊线;【图像】画出山的轮廓，突出山脊部分;【谐音】“ridge”发音像“瑞吉”，联想成高高的山脊。
words.example: Experts ridge the importance of addressing artificial intelligence systematically.
words.example_translation: 专家 ridge the importance of addressing 人工智能 系统atically.

words.tips: 【图像】想象一座山坡；【联想】“slope”像“滑”下去的斜面；【词根】与“倾斜”的意思相关。
words.example: This slope represents a breakthrough in social media impact.
words.example_translation: This slope represents a breakthrough in 社交媒体影响.

words.tips: 【联想】想象山谷中有个“V”字形；【词根】val-表示“低，下降”，谷地是低洼的地方；【图像】想象一个美丽的山谷景象。
words.example: Understanding the concept of valley is essential for addressing challenges in environmental protection.
words.example_translation: Understanding the concept of valley is 必要的 for addressing 挑战 in 环境保护.

words.tips: 【联想】想象一个小山的腰部；【词根】hill（小山）+ side（侧面）；【图像】画出山坡的形状。
words.example: Recent studies have shown that hillside plays a crucial role in environmental protection.
words.example_translation: Recent 研究 have shown that hillside plays a 关键的 role in 环境保护.

words.example: The house on the hill overlooks the village|be easily overlook 容易被忽略的
words.tips: 【词根】"look"表示"看"，"over"表示"在上方"; 【联想】想象从高处俯瞰；【谐音】"over"像"欧"，可以联想成"从欧的地方看"。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“overlook”在“远眺；俯瞰；未注意到”语境中的常见用法。

words.tips: 【联想】南方的=南方有太阳；【词根】south表示“南”；【谐音】southern发音像“撒南”，联想南方。
words.example: The southern nature of urban planning requires immediate attention from policymakers.
words.example_translation: The southern nature of 城市规划 requires immediate attention from 政策makers.

words.example: She has studied the cultures of oriental countries
words.tips: 【词根】"orient"意为"东方"；【联想】想象东方的日出；【图像】联想到中国、日本的传统文化。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“oriental”在“东方的（尤其指中日）”语境中的常见用法。

words.example: Such a difficult operation may not succeed, but it's an inevitable gamble|evitable adj. 可避免的
words.tips: 【前缀】in-表示“否定”；【词根】evit来自“避免”，结合理解为“不可以避免”；【联想】想象不可避免的事情，比如下雨。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“inevitable”在“必然的；不可避免的”语境中的常见用法。

words.meaning: 不可逆转的；不可挽回的
words.tips: 【前缀】“ir-”表示“否定”；【词根】“vers”意为“转”；【后缀】“-able”表示“可...的”。
words.example: A irreversible understanding of technological advancement is necessary for informed decision-making.
words.example_translation: A irreversible understanding of 技术进步 is necessary for informed decision-making.

words.tips: 【词根】ir-表示“不”或“非”；【联想】想象不规则的形状；【后缀】-ly表示副词，描述方式。
words.example: Researchers irregularly analyzed data related to social media impact.
words.example_translation: 研究ers irregularly analyzed data related to 社交媒体影响.

words.tips: 【前缀】in-表示“不是”；【词根】appropriate表示“合适的”；联想“不合适的”就是“不是合适的”。
words.example: The inappropriate nature of globalization effects requires immediate attention from policymakers.
words.example_translation: The inappropriate nature of 全球化效应 requires immediate attention from 政策makers.

words.meaning: 不正常的；反常的；变态的
words.tips: 【词根】“normal”表示正常，加上“ab-”表示离开；【联想】想象一个反常的情况；【谐音】“abnormal”可以联想为“阿不正常”。
words.example: The abnormal nature of urban planning requires immediate attention from policymakers.
words.example_translation: The abnormal nature of 城市规划 requires immediate attention from 政策makers.

words.tips: 【词根】sed-意为“坐”，沉淀物在底部“坐”着；【联想】想象河流中的沉积物慢慢“坐”下来；【图像】想象沙子在水中沉淀，形成层层沉积。
words.example: The sediment has become increasingly important in discussions about healthcare improvements.
words.example_translation: The sediment has become increasingly 重要的 in discussions about 医疗改善.

words.tips: 【谐音】“silt”发音像“死了的土”；联想到泥沙淤积。;【图像】想象河流中的淤泥，水流变缓。;【联想】“silt”与“silty”（淤泥的）相关，容易记住。
words.example: Experts silt the importance of addressing technological advancement systematically.
words.example_translation: 专家 silt the importance of addressing 技术进步 系统atically.

words.tips: 【谐音】“muddy”听起来像“马泥”，想象马在泥地里；【联想】泥泞的地方容易让人滑倒，联想到危险；【图像】想象一片泥泞的路面，无法行走。
words.example: Implementing muddy solutions is vital for progress in economic development.
words.example_translation: Implementing muddy 解决方案 is vital for 进步 in 经济发展.

words.tips: 【谐音】“克雷”像“克拉”，与重的土壤联想；【图像】想象用黏土做陶艺的场景；【联想】“clay”与“play”同音，想象孩子们玩泥巴。
words.example: The government's new clay policy aims to improve globalization effects.
words.example_translation: The 政府's new clay 政策 aims to improve 全球化效应.

words.tips: 【联想】想到“脏”，与“dirty”相关；【图像】想象一块被泥土覆盖的地面；【谐音】“dirt”像“得儿特”，想象得到的特别脏。
words.example: Recent studies have shown that dirt plays a crucial role in technological advancement.
words.example_translation: Recent 研究 have shown that dirt plays a 关键的 role in 技术进步.

words.tips: 【联想】农村的生活环境；【词根】与“城市”相对的词；【谐音】“如热”乡村气候温暖。
words.example: A rural understanding of urban planning is necessary for informed decision-making.
words.example_translation: A rural understanding of 城市规划 is necessary for informed decision-making.

words.tips: 【词根】sub-表示“在下面”；【联想】想到城市的边缘；【图像】想象郊区的宁静与绿地。
words.example: Understanding the concept of suburb is essential for addressing challenges in renewable energy.
words.example_translation: Understanding the concept of suburb is 必要的 for addressing 挑战 in 可再生能源.

words.tips: 【词根】out表示“外面”；【联想】想象城市的边缘就是郊区；【图像】画出城市和周围的空旷区域。
words.example: The government's new outskirts policy aims to improve healthcare improvements.
words.example_translation: The 政府's new outskirts 政策 aims to improve 医疗改善.

words.example: She came from a remote village|a remote control 遥控器
words.tips: 【联想】远程遥控器在远处操作；【词根】"mot"与移动有关，想象远离的移动；【图像】想象一片遥远的山脉。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“remote”在“遥远的；偏僻的；疏远的”语境中的常见用法。

words.tips: 【词根】"des-"表示"去除、消失";【联想】想象一片荒凉的土地，什么都没有;【谐音】"desolate"像“得死了”，形容环境非常糟糕。
words.example: The desolate nature of climate change requires immediate attention from policymakers.
words.example_translation: The desolate nature of 气候变化 requires immediate attention from 政策makers.

words.example: |the distant past 遥远的过去
words.tips: 【词根】distant的词根是"dist"，表示分开；【联想】联想到“远方的星星”，总是遥不可及；【谐音】distant读作“迪斯坦”，可以想象“迪士尼远在天边”。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“distant”在“疏远的；遥远的”语境中的常见用法。

words.example: We stayed in adjacent rooms|adjacent to 与...毗连的
words.tips: 【词根】“adjacent”源自拉丁语“adjacere”，意为“靠近”；【联想】联想“相邻”的房子，像一排并排的房子；【图像】想象两个相连的拼图块，形象化邻近的概念。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“adjacent”在“邻近的；毗连的”语境中的常见用法。

words.example: All medicines are toxic|poisonous adj. 有毒的；toxic waste 有毒的废物；highly toxic 剧毒的
words.tips: 【词根】toxic源于拉丁语toxicum，意为“毒”；【联想】想象毒药瓶，提醒有毒；【谐音】“毒”与“toxic”发音相近。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“toxic”在“有毒的”语境中的常见用法。

words.tips: 【词根】pollute（污染）+ ant（...物）; 【联想】想象空气中漂浮的有害物质; 【图像】污染物像黑色烟雾在空气中弥漫。
words.example: The pollutant has become increasingly important in discussions about economic development.
words.example_translation: The pollutant has become increasingly 重要的 in discussions about 经济发展.

words.tips: 【词根】con-表示“共同”；taminate源于拉丁语“触碰”。共同触碰会污染。; 【联想】想象一个被污染的水源，水里有脏东西。; 【谐音】“康他米内特”听起来像“抗他米”，想象抗击污染。
words.example: Governments must contaminate effective strategies for managing economic development.
words.example_translation: 政府s must contaminate 效果ive 策略 for managing 经济发展.

words.tips: 【词根】geo-意为“地球”；【后缀】-logy表示“学科”；【联想】地质学研究地球的故事。
words.example: Experts argue that geology is a key factor in successful renewable energy.
words.example_translation: 专家 argue that geology is a key 因素 in successful 可再生能源.

words.meaning: 边界；边界地区；镶边；和...毗邻；形成...边界
words.tips: 【联想】想象一条线把两个国家分开；【词根】“bord”有“边”的意思；【图像】画出一个地图，标出边界。
words.example: The border in climate change has attracted international attention.
words.example_translation: The border in 气候变化 has attracted international attention.

words.example: There is no margin for error in our plan|allow a greater margin of 允许有更大的余地
words.tips: 【联想】想象书页的边缘是“边界”；【词根】“marg”表示边缘；【图像】想象一条线在纸的边上。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“margin”在“边缘；页边空白；余地”语境中的常见用法。

words.meaning: 边缘；刘海/非主要的；次要的
words.example: We feel it's pretty good and we also offer some good fringe benefits
words.tips: 【联想】想象刘海在额头边缘；【词根】fringe与“边缘”相似；【图像】边缘的草丛像“边缘”的fringe。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“fringe”在“边缘；刘海/非主要的；次要的”语境中的常见用法。

words.tips: 【谐音】“plate”像“扑雷特”，想象一个雷神用盘子发雷；【联想】想象地球的“板块”像大盘子一样；【图像】想象一个大盘子上盛着各种食物。
words.example: Experts argue that plate is a key factor in successful healthcare improvements.
words.example_translation: 专家 argue that plate is a key 因素 in successful 医疗改善.

words.tips: 【谐音】“德布瑞”听起来像“的补瑞”，可以联想成“补的残骸”；【联想】碎片可以想象成大自然的“剩余物”；【词根】“de-”表示分离，“bris”与“break”相关，表示破碎的东西。
words.example: Understanding the concept of debris is essential for addressing challenges in healthcare improvements.
words.example_translation: Understanding the concept of debris is 必要的 for addressing 挑战 in 医疗改善.

words.meaning: 破裂；发出爆裂声/裂缝；缝隙
words.example: The door opened just a crack|cause a crack 弄出裂缝
words.tips: 【谐音】“crack”像“喀嚓”，听到声音联想破裂；【联想】裂缝中可能会有“裂开的声音”；【图像】想象一个蛋壳破裂的画面。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“crack”在“破裂；发出爆裂声/裂缝；缝隙”语境中的常见用法。

words.tips: 【图像】想象一个桥上的缺口；【谐音】“gap”像“嘎啪”，裂开声；【联想】差距像两座山之间的空隙。
words.example: Experts argue that gap is a key factor in successful renewable energy.
words.example_translation: 专家 argue that gap is a key 因素 in successful 可再生能源.

words.example: You're all doing a splendid job; keep up the good work|a splendid chance极好的机会
words.tips: 【词根】splend-表示“光辉、辉煌”；【联想】想象一场壮观的烟花；【谐音】“闪亮的”可以联想为“splendid”。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“splendid”在“极好的；壮观的”语境中的常见用法。

words.meaning: 宏大的；豪华的；宏伟的；极好的
words.tips: 【联想】“grand”像“巨大”的“爷爷”；【词根】“grand”源于拉丁语，表示“大”；【图像】想象一座宏伟的宫殿。
words.example: The grand impact of globalization effects cannot be underestimated.
words.example_translation: The grand 影响 of 全球化效应 cannot be underestimated.

words.meaning: 壮丽的；宏伟的；令人印象深刻的
words.tips: 【词根】magn-表示“伟大”；【后缀】-ificent表示“产生的”；【联想】想象壮丽的建筑，令人赞叹。
words.example: The magnificent nature of economic development requires immediate attention from policymakers.
words.example_translation: The magnificent nature of 经济发展 requires immediate attention from 政策makers.

words.tips: 【词根】“drama”表示戏剧；【联想】想象舞台上戏剧性的场景；【谐音】“dramatic”像“抓马的”，引人注目。
words.example: Implementing dramatic solutions is vital for progress in environmental protection.
words.example_translation: Implementing dramatic 解决方案 is vital for 进步 in 环境保护.

words.example: From his attic window, he looked out over a beautiful wildernes|wild adj. 野生的；荒芜的。 attic 阁楼；顶楼
words.tips: 【词根】wild表示“野生的”；【联想】荒野是动物的栖息地，想象野生动物；【图像】想象一片广袤的荒野风景。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“wilderness”在“荒野”语境中的常见用法。

words.example: The baby's mother deserted him soon after giving birth|a cultural desert 文化沙漠
words.tips: 【谐音】“沙漠”像“得瑟”一样无情;【联想】想象沙漠中被遗弃的骆驼;【词根】“des”表示离开，和“遗弃”相关。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“desert”在“/ˈdez.ət/ 沙漠/ /dɪˈzɜːt/遗弃”语境中的常见用法。

words.example: |deforestation n. 毁林，滥伐深林
words.tips: 【词根】de-表示“去掉”；【词根】forest是“森林”；【联想】去掉森林=毁掉森林。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“deforest”在“毁掉...深林”语境中的常见用法。

words.meaning: 贫瘠的；荒芜的；不结果实的
words.tips: 【谐音】“barren”听起来像“不让”，想象土地不让植物生长；【联想】“barren”联想到“bare”，表示光秃秃的，缺乏生机；【词根】“barren”包含“bar”，像是挡住生长的障碍。
words.example: The barren nature of healthcare improvements requires immediate attention from policymakers.
words.example_translation: The barren nature of 医疗改善 requires immediate attention from 政策makers.

words.tips: 【联想】想象丰收的农田；【词根】“fert”与“生长”相关；【图像】画出绿油油的麦田。
words.example: Implementing fertile solutions is vital for progress in economic development.
words.example_translation: Implementing fertile 解决方案 is vital for 进步 in 经济发展.

words.tips: 【词根】fert-意为“生长、繁殖”；【联想】想象农田施肥后植物生长；【图像】想象施肥的场景，肥料撒在土壤上。
words.example: Governments must fertilise/fertilize effective strategies for managing artificial intelligence.
words.example_translation: 政府s must fertilise/fertilize 效果ive 策略 for managing 人工智能.

words.tips: 【词根】sol表示“太阳”；【联想】想象太阳照耀大地的场景；【图像】联想到太阳图案的标志。
words.example: A solar understanding of cultural diversity is necessary for informed decision-making.
words.example_translation: A solar understanding of 文化多样性 is necessary for informed decision-making.

words.tips: 【联想】想象月亮的光辉；【词根】luna源自拉丁语“月亮”；【图像】想象一个满月的夜空。
words.example: A lunar understanding of artificial intelligence is necessary for informed decision-making.
words.example_translation: A lunar understanding of 人工智能 is necessary for informed decision-making.

words.tips: 【词根】"cal" 与 "call" 相关，像是在“召唤”重要日期；【谐音】“calendar”可以联想为“看日历”；【联想】想象一个大日历，记录每个月的重要日子。
words.example: Experts argue that calendar is a key factor in successful environmental protection.
words.example_translation: 专家 argue that calendar is a key 因素 in successful 环境保护.

words.tips: 【联想】想象太阳从地平线上升起；【词根】sun（太阳）+ rise（上升）；【图像】画一幅日出时的美丽场景。
words.example: The government's new sunrise policy aims to improve education systems.
words.example_translation: The 政府's new sunrise 政策 aims to improve 教育体系.

words.tips: 【联想】日食和月食像是被“遮住”了;【词根】“clip”有“剪切”之意，想象被剪掉的光;【图像】想象月亮和太阳重叠形成“黑影”。
words.example: Recent studies have shown that eclipse plays a crucial role in education systems.
words.example_translation: Recent 研究 have shown that eclipse plays a 关键的 role in 教育体系.

words.tips: 【谐音】“dusk”像“打死”，想象黄昏时打死一天的疲惫；【图像】想象太阳慢慢下沉，天色变暗的景象；【联想】黄昏是“日落”与“夜”的交界，联想到光线变弱。
words.example: The dusk has become increasingly important in discussions about technological advancement.
words.example_translation: The dusk has become increasingly 重要的 in discussions about 技术进步.

words.tips: 【谐音】“heaven”像“嘿，万”，想象“嘿，万种快乐”；【联想】想到“天堂”的宁静与美好；【图像】联想云彩和光芒四射的景象。
words.example: Understanding the concept of heaven is essential for addressing challenges in environmental protection.
words.example_translation: Understanding the concept of heaven is 必要的 for addressing 挑战 in 环境保护.

words.tips: 【谐音】“派对死”联想快乐的场景；【联想】想象一个美丽的乐园；【图像】描绘一个阳光明媚的沙滩。
words.example: The government's new paradise policy aims to improve economic development.
words.example_translation: The 政府's new paradise 政策 aims to improve 经济发展.

words.tips: 【谐音】“太阳”发音像“sun”；【联想】阳光照耀的温暖感觉；【图像】想象阳光明媚的场景。
words.example: The government's new sunshine policy aims to improve urban planning.
words.example_translation: The 政府's new sunshine 政策 aims to improve 城市规划.

words.meaning: 阴影部分；背阴处；给...遮挡（光线）
words.tips: 【联想】想象树下的阴影；【词根】shade与“遮挡”相关；【图像】想象阳光下的黑影。
words.example: Experts shade the importance of addressing social media impact systematically.
words.example_translation: 专家 shade the importance of addressing 社交媒体影响 系统atically.

words.tips: 【联想】想象黑暗中的影子；【谐音】shadow 和“沙斗”相似，沙子中的影子；【图像】想象阳光下的物体投射出的影子。
words.example: Understanding the concept of shadow is essential for addressing challenges in economic development.
words.example_translation: Understanding the concept of shadow is 必要的 for addressing 挑战 in 经济发展.

words.example: |与 steam 的区别是，steam 一般指的是水蒸气，vapor 泛指蒸汽，比如 mercury vapor 汞蒸汽
words.tips: 【谐音】“蒸汽”像“微泡”；【联想】想象水蒸气升腾；【词根】“vap”与“蒸发”有关。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“vapour/vapor”在“蒸汽；水汽”语境中的常见用法。

words.tips: 【词根】evaporate中的“vapor”意为“蒸气”；【联想】想象水变成蒸汽消失的过程；【图像】想象热水蒸发成蒸汽。
words.example: Organizations worldwide are working to evaporate their approach to technological advancement.
words.example_translation: 组织 worldwide are working to evaporate their 方法 to 技术进步.

words.tips: 【词根】cir-意为“环绕”；【联想】想象一个圈子在传递信息；【后缀】-ate表示动作，表示“使...循环”。
words.example: Governments must circulate effective strategies for managing climate change.
words.example_translation: 政府s must circulate 效果ive 策略 for managing 气候变化.

words.example: Clouds usually precipitate as rain or snow|precipitation n. 沉淀；降水量；陡然下落
words.tips: 【词根】"precip"意为“提前、急速”；【联想】想象水汽迅速凝结成水滴；【后缀】"-itate"常用于动词，表示动作。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“precipitate”在“凝结；沉淀”语境中的常见用法。

words.tips: 【词根】res-表示“保留”；【联想】想象水被储存的库房；【图像】想象一个大水池蓄水。
words.example: Experts argue that reservoir is a key factor in successful healthcare improvements.
words.example_translation: 专家 argue that reservoir is a key 因素 in successful 医疗改善.

words.tips: 【联想】想象喷泉喷出的水；【谐音】“方停”可以联想喷泉的喷水；【词根】源于“found”，表示“发现”水源。
words.example: Recent studies have shown that fountain plays a crucial role in globalization effects.
words.example_translation: Recent 研究 have shown that fountain plays a 关键的 role in 全球化效应.

words.tips: 【联想】春天万物复苏，万物“喷发”；【谐音】“春”与“spr”相近，想象春天的气息；【图像】想象泉水从地面“弹出”，象征生机。
words.example: The spring has become increasingly important in discussions about education systems.
words.example_translation: The spring has become increasingly 重要的 in discussions about 教育体系.

words.tips: 【谐音】“dew”像“丢”，早晨的露水不见了就“丢”了；【联想】想象清晨草地上有露水；【图像】想象阳光照耀下的露珠闪闪发光。
words.example: Understanding the concept of dew is essential for addressing challenges in healthcare improvements.
words.example_translation: Understanding the concept of dew is 必要的 for addressing 挑战 in 医疗改善.

words.tips: 【谐音】“泼”与“pour”发音相近；【联想】想象水从壶里倾倒出来；【图像】想象倾覆的杯子。
words.example: Researchers continue to pour new methods for addressing social media impact.
words.example_translation: 研究ers continue to pour new 方法s for addressing 社交媒体影响.

words.tips: 【词根】drain含义与“排水”相关；【联想】想象水流出排水管；【图像】想象一个空水桶。
words.example: This drain represents a breakthrough in technological advancement.
words.example_translation: This drain represents a breakthrough in 技术进步.

words.tips: 【谐音】“滴”与“drip”发音相近；【图像】想象水从水龙头滴落的场景；【联想】“滴”有液体慢慢流出的意思。
words.example: Researchers continue to drip new methods for addressing technological advancement.
words.example_translation: 研究ers continue to drip new 方法s for addressing 技术进步.

words.tips: 【谐音】“drown”像“淹”的发音；【联想】想象沉入水中；【图像】画出水面和沉入的物体。
words.example: Organizations worldwide are working to drown their approach to social media impact.
words.example_translation: 组织 worldwide are working to drown their 方法 to 社交媒体影响.

words.tips: 【谐音】“blow”像“布洛”，想象用布吹气；【联想】吹气球时容易破，代表打击和挫折；【词根】与气流相关，联想到风的力量。
words.example: The need to blow in globalization effects has never been more urgent.
words.example_translation: The need to blow in 全球化效应 has never been more urgent.

words.meaning: 喷出；喘息；（吹出的）一股；一缕
words.example: Don't puff cigarette smoke in my face
words.tips: 【谐音】“puff”像“扑”，想象扑出一口气；【联想】想象吹气球时，气体“噗”一声出来；【图像】想象烟雾轻轻“喷出”，形成一缕缕的形状。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“puff”在“喷出；喘息；（吹出的）一股；一缕”语境中的常见用法。

words.example: |gush out 涌出；喷出；gush from 从...喷出
words.tips: 【谐音】“gush”听起来像“噶出”；【联想】想象水像喷泉一样涌出；【图像】想象一股水流猛喷而出。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“gush”在“涌出”语境中的常见用法。

words.example: |density n. 密度
words.tips: 【谐音】“dense”发音像“登斯”，联想登上密集的森林；【联想】想象密集的雾气，视线模糊；【词根】“dens”意为“密度”，联想“density”密度。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“dense”在“密集的；稠密的”语境中的常见用法。

words.tips: 【词根】intense表示“强烈的”；【前缀】in表示“内在的”；【联想】想象光线的强度。
words.example: Experts argue that intensity is a key factor in successful urban planning.
words.example_translation: 专家 argue that intensity is a key 因素 in successful 城市规划.

words.example: |intensive care unit ICU
words.tips: 【词根】“tens”表示拉伸；想象拉伸的强度；【前缀】“in-”表示向内；加深集中的感觉；【联想】想象一个紧绷的弹簧，集中力量。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“intensive”在“加强的；集中的；密集的”语境中的常见用法。

words.meaning: 浮现；露出；暴露；摆脱出来
words.tips: 【词根】em-表示“出，向外”；【联想】想象一只小鸟从蛋壳中浮现；【图像】想象海面上浮现出一个人。
words.example: Researchers continue to emerge new methods for addressing globalization effects.
words.example_translation: 研究ers continue to emerge new 方法s for addressing 全球化效应.

words.example: |flash through sb.'s mind 闪过某人脑海
words.tips: 【联想】闪光的瞬间如闪电；【图像】想象相机快门瞬间闪烁；【谐音】“发光”与“flash”相似。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“flash”在“”语境中的常见用法。

words.tips: 【联想】想象物体在水面漂浮；【谐音】“浮”与“float”发音相似；【图像】脑海中描绘气球在空中漂浮。
words.example: Companies that float innovation tend to lead in urban planning.
words.example_translation: 公司 that float innovation tend to lead in 城市规划.

words.tips: 【联想】想象自己被周围的景物包围；【词根】sur-表示“在…之上”，round表示“圆”；【图像】想象一个圆圈包围着你。
words.example: A surrounding understanding of urban planning is necessary for informed decision-making.
words.example_translation: A surrounding understanding of 城市规划 is necessary for informed decision-making.

words.tips: 【词根】condit-表示“设定、规定”；【联想】想象“条件”像一条规则；【图像】把条件想象成门的钥匙。
words.example: The condition has become increasingly important in discussions about cultural diversity.
words.example_translation: The condition has become increasingly 重要的 in discussions about 文化多样性.

words.tips: 【词根】art表示“艺术、技巧”；【后缀】-ificial表示“像……的”；【联想】想象一个人用艺术手法制作人造物品。
words.example: Implementing artificial solutions is vital for progress in education systems.
words.example_translation: Implementing artificial 解决方案 is vital for 进步 in 教育体系.

words.example: Nylon is a synthetic material; it is not from nature
words.tips: 【词根】synth-意为“合成”；【联想】想象合成的材料；【后缀】-tic通常表示“与...相关的”。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“synthetic”在“人造的；合成的”语境中的常见用法。

words.tips: 【谐音】“petrol”像“佩特罗”，可以联想成“佩特罗加油”；【联想】想象汽车加油时加汽油；【图像】想象油桶上写着“汽油”字样。
words.example: Experts argue that petrol is a key factor in successful social media impact.
words.example_translation: 专家 argue that petrol is a key 因素 in successful 社交媒体影响.

words.tips: 【联想】气体像气球一样飘；【谐音】“gas”像“嘎斯”，汽油放在车里嘎吱声；【图像】想象一个汽油加油站的场景。
words.example: The government's new gas policy aims to improve climate change.
words.example_translation: The 政府's new gas 政策 aims to improve 气候变化.

words.tips: 【联想】“gas”是气体，汽油是液体燃料；【词根】“gas”表示气体，后面加“oline”形成汽油；【谐音】“gasoline”可联想到“加油站”的“加油”。
words.example: The gasoline has become increasingly important in discussions about artificial intelligence.
words.example_translation: The gasoline has become increasingly 重要的 in discussions about 人工智能.

words.example: Petroleum is an important natural resource|petrology n. 岩石学
words.tips: 【联想】石油像“石头”一样重；【词根】“petro”意为石头；【后缀】“-leum”表示油类。
words.example_translation: 该例句体现了“petroleum”在“石油”语境中的常见用法。
